title: Rise as One
description: Six of Crows meets Ember in the Ashes, from India’s most successful fantasy author.RISE follows a young thief and her gang as they battle to overthrow a brutal tyrant and stay a demon invasion.Brine, Shade, Pari, and Ace are part of a gang of outlaws, each with her own set of skills, specializing in impossible heists for a hefty fee. When an anonymous client asks these ‘Brokens’ to break into the Temple of Vish and steal a forbidden book, the crew become embroiled in a global conflict between the corrupt Prime Minister Nomandra and an order of corrupt priests commanding an army of Arusa, demons who can materialize out of any manmade substance. What follows is an adventure unlike any other, filled with magic, action, and romance.
author: Ashok K. Banker
